auth.login_description: Login to your account to continue.
auth.signup_description: Create an account to get started.
auth.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.signup_failed: Sign up failed. Please try again.

hero.title: Discover Your True Personality
hero.subtitle: Take our free personality test and get a detailed report on your type.

features.title: Why Choose MBTITEST?
features.subtitle: Experience the most comprehensive personality assessment platform with advanced social features and global reach.

accurate.title: Accurate
accurate.description: Our test is based on the official Myers-Briggs Type Indicator.

social.title: Social Features
social.description: Share your results with friends and see how you compare.

insights.title: Deeper Insights
insights.description: Go beyond your type with in-depth analysis and reports.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your personal data is encrypted and never shared with third parties.

languages.title: 21 Languages
languages.description: Available in 21 languages with culturally adapted content.

instant.title: Instant Results
instant.description: Get your personality type immediately after completing the test.

test.title: Free Personality Test
test.subtitle: Discover your personality type in minutes and learn more about yourself.
test.privacy: We don't save your answers or results.
test.accuracy: Based on the official Myers-Briggs Type Indicator.
test.tagline: Join millions who have discovered their true personality.
test.q1: You find it difficult to introduce yourself to other people.
test.q2: You often get so lost in thought that you ignore or forget your surroundings.
test.q3: You try to respond to your e-mails as soon as possible and cannot stand a messy inbox.
test.q4: You find it easy to stay relaxed and focused even when there is some pressure.
test.q5: You do not usually initiate conversations.
test.q6: You rarely do something just out of sheer curiosity.
test.q7: You feel superior to other people.
test.q8: Being organized is more important to you than being adaptable.
test.q9: You are usually highly motivated and energetic.
test.q10: Winning a debate matters less to you than making sure no one gets upset.
test.q11: You often feel as if you have to justify yourself to other people.
test.q12: Your home and work environments are quite tidy.
test.q13: You do not mind being at the center of attention.
test.q14: You consider yourself more practical than creative.
test.q16: Your travel plans are usually well thought out.
test.q17: It is often difficult for you to relate to other people's feelings.
test.q18: Your mood can change very quickly.
test.q19: In a discussion, truth should be more important than people's sensitivities.
test.q20: You rarely worry about how your actions affect other people.
test.q21: Your work style is closer to random energy spikes than to a methodical and organized approach.
test.q22: You are often envious of others.
test.q23: An interesting book or a video game is often better than a social event.
test.q24: Being able to develop a plan and stick to it is the most important part of every project.
test.q25: You rarely get carried away by fantasies and ideas.
test.q26: You often find yourself lost in thought when you are walking in nature.
test.q27: If someone does not respond to your e-mail quickly, you start worrying if you said something wrong.
test.q28: As a parent, you would rather see your child grow up kind than smart.
test.q29: You do not let other people influence your actions.
test.q30: Your dreams tend to focus on the real world and its events.
test.q31: It does not take you much time to start getting involved in social activities at your new workplace.
test.q32: You are more of a natural improviser than a careful planner.
test.q33: Your emotions control you more than you control them.
test.q34: You enjoy going to social events that involve dress-up or role-play activities.
test.q35: You often spend time exploring unrealistic and impractical yet intriguing ideas.
test.q36: You would rather improvise than spend time coming up with a detailed plan.
test.q37: You are a relatively reserved and quiet person.
test.q38: If you had a business, you would find it very difficult to fire loyal but underperforming employees.
test.q39: You often contemplate the reasons for human existence.
test.q40: Logic is usually more important than heart when it comes to making important decisions.
test.q41: You find it easy to empathize with a person whose experiences are very different from yours.
test.q42: You usually prefer to be spontaneous rather than planned.
test.q43: You feel comfortable just walking up to someone you find interesting and striking up a conversation.
test.q44: You are not too bothered by messy people.
test.q46: You are very good at managing your time.
test.q48: You tend to avoid drawing attention to yourself.
test.q50: You are definitely not an artistic type of person.
test.q51: You think the world would be a better place if people relied more on rationality and less on their feelings.
test.q52: You prefer to do your chores before allowing yourself to relax.
test.q53: You enjoy watching movies that make you cry.
test.q54: You are very private and do not share your feelings easily.
test.q55: You are very good at reading other people's emotions.
test.q57: You often feel overwhelmed by emotions.
test.q58: You prefer to be in a group rather than on your own.
test.q60: You are a very creative person.
test.conclusion_text: INTJs are full of contradictions. They are imaginative yet decisive, ambitious yet private, and curious yet focused. For these personalities, life is like a giant game of chess. And they never lose faith that, with enough ingenuity and insight, they can find a way to win.

results.title: Your Personality Type Is
results.personality_type_description: This determines how we see the world and make decisions.
results.no_result_description: We couldn't find your test result. Please take the test to discover your personality type.
results.confidence_description: Our confidence in this result is {confidence}%.
results.extreme_response_pattern: You tended to choose the most extreme answers.
results.excessive_neutral_responses: You used a lot of neutral answers.
results.too_fast_completion: You completed the test very quickly.
results.trait_I_text: Introverts are most energized when they are alone. They prefer deep, meaningful social interactions and prefer to socialize with a few close friends rather than a large group of people.
results.trait_E_text: Extraverts gain energy from social interaction. They are outgoing and enjoy interacting with a wide variety of people.
results.trait_N_text: Intuitive individuals focus on possibilities and the future. They enjoy thinking abstractly and focus on the big picture rather than the details.
results.trait_S_text: Sensing individuals are practical and focus on facts and details. They prefer hands-on experience rather than theory.
results.trait_T_text: Thinking individuals make decisions based on logic and objective criteria. They prioritize fairness and justice over the feelings of others.
results.trait_F_text: Feeling individuals make decisions based on their values and feelings. They prioritize harmony and cooperation.
results.trait_J_text: Judging individuals are decisive and prefer planning and structure. They enjoy having things organized and like to have things decided.
results.trait_P_text: Prospecting individuals are flexible and prefer to keep their options open. They enjoy spontaneity and enjoy adapting to new situations.

personalities.title: 16 Personality Types
personalities.subtitle: Learn about each of the 16 personality types and find the one that's most like you.
personalities.analysts_description: Intuitive (N) and Thinking (T) personality types, known for their rationality, impartiality, and intellectual excellence.
personalities.diplomats_description: Intuitive (N) and Feeling (F) personality types, known for their empathy, diplomatic skills, and passionate idealism.
personalities.sentinels_description: Observant (S) and Judging (J) personality types, known for their practicality and focus on order, security, and stability.
personalities.explorers_description: Observant (S) and Prospecting (P) personality types, known for their spontaneity, ingenuity, and flexibility.

intj.name: Architect
intj.title: Architect (INTJ)
intj.subtitle: Imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.
intj.introduction_text: It's lonely at the top, and being one of the rarest and most strategically capable personality types, INTJs know this all too well. INTJs form just two percent of the population, and women of this personality type are especially rare, forming just 0.8% of the population. They are imaginative yet decisive, ambitious yet private, and curious but they do not squander their energy.
intj.strength_1_text: INTJs are brilliant strategists, with a knack for planning and foresight.
intj.weakness_1_text: Their confidence can sometimes border on arrogance, making them dismissive of others' opinions.
intj.romantic_relationships_text: INTJs approach romance as they do most things: strategically. They seek intellectual connection and are loyal, albeit not overly demonstrative, partners.
intj.friendships_text: INTJs prefer a small circle of intellectually stimulating friends over a large social group.
intj.parenthood_text: As parents, INTJs encourage independence and a thirst for knowledge in their children.
intj.career_paths_text: They excel in fields that require strategic thinking and innovation, like science, engineering, or law.
intj.workplace_habits_text: INTJs are independent and efficient workers who thrive when given autonomy.
intj.conclusion_text: INTJs are a bundle of contradictions, but their intellectual prowess is undeniable.

intp.name: Logician
intp.title: Logician (INTP)
intp.subtitle: Innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.
intp.introduction_text: INTPs are known for their brilliant theories and unrelenting logic. They are proud of their creativity and unique perspective, as well as their vigorous intellect. Usually known as the philosopher, the architect, or the dreamy professor, INTPs have been responsible for many scientific discoveries throughout history.
intp.strength_1_text: INTPs can analyze complex problems and see patterns others miss.
intp.weakness_1_text: Their focus on logic can make them seem insensitive to the feelings of others.
intp.romantic_relationships_text: INTPs are straightforward partners who value intellectual connection, though they can be awkward in expressing emotions.
intp.friendships_text: They enjoy the company of those who can keep up with their non-stop flow of ideas.
intp.parenthood_text: INTP parents are relaxed and encourage their children to think for themselves.
intp.career_paths_text: INTPs thrive in roles that allow for innovation and deep thinking, such as research or computer science.
intp.workplace_habits_text: They prefer flexible work environments with minimal rules.
intp.conclusion_text: INTPs are a rare and valuable personality type, with a unique ability to innovate and solve problems.

entj.name: Commander
entj.title: Commander (ENTJ)
entj.subtitle: Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way – or making one.
entj.introduction_text: ENTJs are natural-born leaders. People with this personality type embody the gifts of charisma and confidence, and project authority in a way that draws crowds together behind a common goal. But unlike their more sensitive Diplomat counterparts, ENTJs are characterized by an often ruthless level of rationality, using their drive, determination and sharp minds to achieve whatever end they've set for themselves.
entj.strength_1_text: ENTJs are masters of efficiency, hating to see time or resources wasted.
entj.weakness_1_text: Their strong will can make them appear stubborn and unwilling to listen to others.
entj.romantic_relationships_text: ENTJs are dedicated partners who take their commitments seriously and enjoy helping their partners achieve their goals.
entj.friendships_text: They are social butterflies who build a wide network of friends and allies.
entj.parenthood_text: ENTJ parents are structured and goal-oriented, pushing their children to succeed.
entj.career_paths_text: They are natural leaders, excelling in business, management, and other leadership roles.
entj.workplace_habits_text: ENTJs are driven and organized, always looking for ways to improve processes.
entj.conclusion_text: ENTJs are powerful individuals who can achieve anything they set their minds to.

entp.name: Debater
entp.title: Debater (ENTP)
entp.subtitle: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.
entp.introduction_text: The ENTP personality type is the ultimate devil's advocate, thriving on the process of shredding arguments and beliefs and letting the ribbons drift in the wind for all to see. Unlike their more determined Judging (J) counterparts, ENTPs don't do this because they are trying to achieve some deeper purpose or strategic goal, but for the simple reason that it's fun.
entp.strength_1_text: ENTPs love to learn and can speak on a wide range of topics.
entp.weakness_1_text: They can sometimes play devil's advocate to a fault, making them seem argumentative.
entp.romantic_relationships_text: ENTPs are enthusiastic and creative partners, but they can be unreliable.
entp.friendships_text: ENTP friendships are built on a foundation of intellectual debate and shared ideas.
entp.parenthood_text: ENTP parents encourage their children to be curious and question everything.
entp.career_paths_text: They excel in dynamic roles that require constant learning, like entrepreneurship or consulting.
entp.workplace_habits_text: ENTPs are idea-oriented and enjoy brainstorming solutions to complex problems.
entp.conclusion_text: ENTPs are masters of intellectual debate, always ready for a mental sparring match.

infj.name: Advocate
infj.title: Advocate (INFJ)
infj.subtitle: Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists.
infj.introduction_text: The INFJ personality type is very rare, making up less than one percent of the population, but they nonetheless leave their mark on the world. As Diplomats (NF), they have an inborn sense of idealism and morality, but what sets them apart is their accompanying Judging (J) trait – INFJs are not idle dreamers, but people capable of taking concrete steps to realize their goals and make a lasting positive impact.
infj.strength_1_text: INFJs have a vivid imagination and are highly creative.
infj.weakness_1_text: Their strong feelings can make them overly sensitive to criticism.
infj.romantic_relationships_text: INFJs seek deep, meaningful connections and are exceptionally loyal partners.
infj.friendships_text: They form strong, intimate bonds with a few trusted friends.
infj.parenthood_text: INFJ parents are warm and supportive, nurturing their children's emotional growth.
infj.career_paths_text: They are drawn to careers where they can help others, such as counseling or teaching.
infj.workplace_habits_text: INFJs are dedicated workers who are passionate about their mission.
infj.conclusion_text: INFJs are inspiring idealists who strive to make the world a better place.

infp.name: Mediator
infp.title: Mediator (INFP)
infp.subtitle: Poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.
infp.introduction_text: INFP personalities are true idealists, always looking for the hint of good in even the worst of people and events, searching for ways to make things better. While they may be perceived as calm, reserved, or even shy, INFPs have an inner flame and passion that can truly shine. Comprising just 4% of the population, the risk of feeling misunderstood is unfortunately high for the INFP personality type – but when they find like-minded people to spend their time with, the harmony they feel will be a fountain of joy and inspiration.
infp.strength_1_text: INFPs' idealism helps them see the good in everyone and everything.
infp.weakness_1_text: Their idealism can sometimes make them unrealistic and impractical.
infp.romantic_relationships_text: INFPs are caring and supportive partners who seek a deep emotional connection.
infp.friendships_text: They are loyal and compassionate friends, always there to lend an ear.
infp.parenthood_text: INFP parents are nurturing and encourage their children's creativity.
infp.career_paths_text: They thrive in careers that align with their values, such as writing, art, or social work.
infp.workplace_habits_text: INFPs are driven by their values and seek meaningful work.
infp.conclusion_text: INFPs are gentle souls who bring a unique sense of wonder to the world.

enfj.name: Protagonist
enfj.title: Protagonist (ENFJ)
enfj.subtitle: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners.
enfj.introduction_text: ENFJs are natural-born leaders, full of passion and charisma. Forming around two percent of the population, they are oftentimes our politicians, our coaches and our teachers, reaching out and inspiring others to achieve and to do good in the world. With a natural confidence that begets influence, ENFJs take a great deal of pride and joy in guiding others to work together to improve themselves and their community.
enfj.strength_1_text: ENFJs are reliable and have a strong sense of empathy.
enfj.weakness_1_text: Their idealism can lead to disappointment when reality falls short.
enfj.romantic_relationships_text: ENFJs are passionate and supportive partners who invest a lot of energy into their relationships.
enfj.friendships_text: They are popular and have a wide circle of friends, always willing to help.
enfj.parenthood_text: ENFJ parents are encouraging and aim to be role models for their children.
enfj.career_paths_text: They excel as leaders in fields like politics, teaching, and human resources.
enfj.workplace_habits_text: ENFJs are natural leaders who inspire and motivate their teams.
enfj.conclusion_text: ENFJs are charismatic leaders who inspire others to be their best selves.

enfp.name: Campaigner
enfp.title: Campaigner (ENFP)
enfp.subtitle: Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.
enfp.introduction_text: The ENFP personality is a true free spirit. They are often the life of the party, but unlike Explorers, they are less interested in the sheer excitement and pleasure of the moment than they are in enjoying the social and emotional connections they make with others. Charming, independent, energetic and compassionate, the 7% of the population that they comprise can certainly be felt in any crowd.
enfp.strength_1_text: ENFPs are curious and observant, always eager to learn new things.
enfp.weakness_1_text: Their focus on ideas can lead to neglect of practical matters.
enfp.romantic_relationships_text: ENFPs are enthusiastic partners who bring a lot of energy and fun to their relationships.
enfp.friendships_text: They are friendly and outgoing, easily making new friends wherever they go.
enfp.parenthood_text: ENFP parents are creative and fun-loving, creating a stimulating environment for their children.
enfp.career_paths_text: They thrive in creative and people-oriented roles, such as journalism, acting, or sales.
enfp.workplace_habits_text: ENFPs are creative problem-solvers who enjoy collaborating with others.
enfp.conclusion_text: ENFPs are free spirits who bring a contagious enthusiasm to everything they do.

istj.name: Logistician
istj.title: Logistician (ISTJ)
istj.subtitle: Practical and fact-minded individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted.
istj.introduction_text: The ISTJ personality type is thought to be the most abundant, making up around 13% of the population. Their defining characteristics of integrity, practical logic and tireless dedication to duty make ISTJs a vital core to many families, as well as organizations that uphold traditions, rules and standards, such as law offices, regulatory bodies and the military.
istj.strength_1_text: ISTJs are known for their integrity and straightforwardness.
istj.weakness_1_text: Their respect for rules can make them stubborn and resistant to change.
istj.romantic_relationships_text: ISTJs are loyal and reliable partners who value stability and tradition.
istj.friendships_text: They are dependable friends who can always be counted on.
istj.parenthood_text: ISTJ parents are responsible and consistent, providing a stable environment for their children.
istj.career_paths_text: They excel in roles that require precision and reliability, such as accounting or logistics.
istj.workplace_habits_text: ISTJs are methodical and hardworking, with a strong sense of duty.
istj.conclusion_text: ISTJs are the bedrock of society, providing stability and order.

isfj.name: Defender
isfj.title: Defender (ISFJ)
isfj.subtitle: Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.
isfj.introduction_text: The ISFJ personality type is quite unique, as many of their qualities defy the definition of their individual traits. Though possessing the Feeling (F) trait, ISFJs have excellent analytical abilities; though Introverted (I), they have well-developed people skills and robust social relationships; and though they are a Judging (J) type, ISFJs are often receptive to change and new ideas.
isfj.strength_1_text: ISFJs are warm and selfless, always ready to help those in need.
isfj.weakness_1_text: Their sensitivity can cause them to take criticism to heart.
isfj.romantic_relationships_text: ISFJs are caring and devoted partners who prioritize the needs of their loved ones.
isfj.friendships_text: They are loyal and reliable friends who are always there for support.
isfj.parenthood_text: ISFJ parents are nurturing and protective, creating a warm and loving home.
isfj.career_paths_text: They are drawn to careers in healthcare, education, and social work.
isfj.workplace_habits_text: ISFJs are diligent and conscientious workers, with a strong sense of responsibility.
isfj.conclusion_text: ISFJs are dedicated protectors who bring warmth and stability to the world.

estj.name: Executive
estj.title: Executive (ESTJ)
estj.subtitle: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things – or people.
estj.introduction_text: ESTJs are representatives of tradition and order, utilizing their understanding of what is right, wrong and socially acceptable to bring families and communities together. Embracing the values of honesty, dedication and dignity, people with the ESTJ personality type are valued for their clear advice and guidance, and they happily lead the way on difficult paths.
estj.strength_1_text: ESTJs are dedicated and reliable, always seeing tasks through to completion.
estj.weakness_1_text: Their strong beliefs can make them inflexible and resistant to new ideas.
estj.romantic_relationships_text: ESTJs are responsible and dependable partners who value tradition and security.
estj.friendships_text: They enjoy organizing social events and bringing people together.
estj.parenthood_text: ESTJ parents are structured and instill a strong sense of responsibility in their children.
estj.career_paths_text: They excel in leadership roles in business, law enforcement, and the military.
estj.workplace_habits_text: ESTJs are organized and efficient, ensuring that things run smoothly.
estj.conclusion_text: ESTJs are pillars of the community, providing structure and direction.

esfj.name: Consul
esfj.title: Consul (ESFJ)
esfj.subtitle: Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.
esfj.introduction_text: People who share the ESFJ personality type are, for lack of a better word, popular. In high school, ESFJs are the cheerleaders and the quarterbacks, setting the tone, taking the spotlight and leading their teams forward to victory and fame. Later in life, ESFJs continue to enjoy supporting their friends and loved ones, organizing social gatherings and doing their best to make sure everyone is happy.
esfj.strength_1_text: ESFJs are excellent at managing daily tasks and practical matters.
esfj.weakness_1_text: Their focus on social harmony can make them overly concerned with what others think.
esfj.romantic_relationships_text: ESFJs are caring and attentive partners who thrive on making their loved ones happy.
esfj.friendships_text: They are social butterflies with a large circle of friends, always at the center of the action.
esfj.parenthood_text: ESFJ parents are supportive and create a warm, nurturing environment.
esfj.career_paths_text: They are drawn to careers that involve helping people, such as teaching, nursing, or event planning.
esfj.workplace_habits_text: ESFJs are cooperative team players who foster a positive work environment.
esfj.conclusion_text: ESFJs are caring and social individuals who bring people together.

istp.name: Virtuoso
istp.title: Virtuoso (ISTP)
istp.subtitle: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.
istp.introduction_text: ISTPs love to explore with their hands and their eyes, touching and examining the world around them with cool rationalism and spirited curiosity. People with this personality type are natural Makers, moving from project to project, building the useful and the superfluous for the fun of it, and learning from their environment as they go. Machinists and engineers, ISTPs find no greater joy than in getting their hands dirty pulling things apart and putting them back together, just a little bit better than they were before.
istp.strength_1_text: ISTPs are usually up for a new challenge, and they are often brimming with energy. This makes them adaptable and cheerful companions.
istp.strength_2_text: ISTPs have a unique blend of creativity and practicality. They love to tinker and find new ways to solve hands-on problems.
istp.weakness_1_text: ISTPs can be very stubborn. If someone tries to criticize their lifestyle, habits, or ideas, they can become very defensive.
istp.weakness_2_text: ISTPs are notoriously difficult to get to know. They are very private individuals, and they don't like to talk about their feelings.
istp.romantic_relationships_text: In relationships, ISTPs are independent and need their own space. They are loyal and committed partners, but they need a partner who understands their need for freedom.
istp.friendships_text: ISTP friends are always up for an adventure. They are fun-loving and spontaneous, but they also value their alone time.
istp.parenthood_text: As parents, ISTPs encourage their children to be independent and self-reliant. They are not overly emotional, but they show their love through practical support and by sharing their skills.
istp.career_paths_text: ISTPs excel in careers that require hands-on work and problem-solving skills. They are natural mechanics, engineers, and technicians.
istp.workplace_habits_text: In the workplace, ISTPs are practical and logical. They prefer to work alone and are not fond of strict rules or regulations.
istp.conclusion_text: ISTPs' talents are many, but they are often hidden from view. These personalities are hard to read, and they need their space. But once you get to know them, you'll find a loyal and capable friend who is always ready to lend a hand.

isfp.name: Adventurer
isfp.title: Adventurer (ISFP)
isfp.subtitle: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore and experience something new.
isfp.introduction_text: ISFP personality types are true artists, but not necessarily in the conventional sense. For them, life itself is a canvas for self-expression. From the way they dress to how they spend their free time, ISFPs act in ways that vividly reflect who they are as unique individuals. And every ISFP is certainly unique.
isfp.strength_1_text: ISFPs are relaxed and warm, and their 'live and let live' attitude makes them likable and popular.
isfp.weakness_1_text: Their independence can make them resistant to rules and regulations.
isfp.romantic_relationships_text: ISFPs are spontaneous and passionate partners who enjoy living in the moment.
isfp.friendships_text: They are loyal and supportive friends who value deep connections.
isfp.parenthood_text: ISFP parents are relaxed and encourage their children's individuality.
isfp.career_paths_text: They thrive in creative and hands-on roles, such as art, design, or conservation.
isfp.workplace_habits_text: ISFPs prefer flexible work environments that allow for creative freedom.
isfp.conclusion_text: ISFPs are artistic souls who bring beauty and spontaneity to the world.

estp.name: Entrepreneur
estp.title: Entrepreneur (ESTP)
estp.subtitle: Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.
estp.introduction_text: ESTPs always have an impact on their immediate surroundings – the best way to spot them at a party is to look for the whirling eddy of people flitting about them as they move from group to group. Laughing and entertaining with a blunt and earthy humor, ESTP personalities love to be the center of attention. If an audience member is asked to come on stage, ESTPs volunteer – or volunteer a shy friend.
estp.strength_1_text: ESTPs are not afraid to take risks and dive into the action.
estp.weakness_1_text: Their love of action can make them impatient with theory and long-term planning.
estp.romantic_relationships_text: ESTPs are exciting and energetic partners who enjoy a fast-paced lifestyle.
estp.friendships_text: They are fun-loving and adventurous friends, always ready for a new experience.
estp.parenthood_text: ESTP parents are playful and encourage their children to be active and independent.
estp.career_paths_text: They excel in fast-paced and hands-on careers, such as sales, marketing, or emergency services.
estp.workplace_habits_text: ESTPs are action-oriented problem-solvers who thrive in dynamic environments.
estp.conclusion_text: ESTPs are energetic thrill-seekers who live life in the fast lane.

esfp.name: Entertainer
esfp.title: Entertainer (ESFP)
esfp.subtitle: Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people – life is never boring around them.
esfp.introduction_text: If anyone is to be found spontaneously breaking into song and dance, it is the ESFP personality type. ESFPs get caught up in the excitement of the moment, and want everyone else to feel that way, too. No other personality type is as generous with their time and energy as ESFPs when it comes to encouraging others, and no other personality type does it with such irresistible style.
esfp.strength_1_text: ESFPs have a unique sense of style and are not afraid to stand out.
esfp.weakness_1_text: Their need for excitement can make them easily bored with routine.
esfp.romantic_relationships_text: ESFPs are fun-loving and spontaneous partners who enjoy showering their loved ones with affection.
esfp.friendships_text: They are the life of the party and have a wide circle of friends.
esfp.parenthood_text: ESFP parents are playful and create a fun and loving home for their children.
esfp.career_paths_text: They thrive in careers that involve performance and interacting with people, such as acting, sales, or event planning.
esfp.workplace_habits_text: ESFPs bring energy and enthusiasm to the workplace and enjoy collaborating with others.
esfp.conclusion_text: ESFPs are born entertainers who bring joy and excitement to everyone around them.

people.title: Find People
people.no_users_found: No users found with the current filters.

profile.title: Profile
profile.historyDescription: Here are your past MBTI test results.
profile.messagesDescription: View and manage your direct messages.
profile.messagesContent: Communicate with other users and share your insights.
